metrics.name: Number of dropouts
metrics.description: Number of cases that were started and not successfully completed

metrics.name: Dropout rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that were started and not successfully completed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT LAST(event_name) IN (${dropout_events})))
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of idle cases
metrics.description: Number of cases that are open long enough to qualify as dropouts

metrics.name: Amount of time spent on dropouts
metrics.description: Total cycle time of all cases until the last event before dropout
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)) - (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) FILTER (
		WHERE (SELECT LAST(event_name) IN (${dropout_events}))
   )

variables.name: dropout_events
variables.description: Events that identify a dropout case, for example 'Reject Quote', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision'

defaultValues.defaultValue:
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Opportunity',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - Duplicate',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: 00 Dead - Lost',
'Update Lead Status to: Archive',
'Reject Quote'

variables.name: case_end_events
variables.description: Events that identify when the case is completed, for example 'Incident Closed', 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'

defaultValues.defaultValue:
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: 06 Closed Won (Onboarding)',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Lost',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Opportunity',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - No Decision',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: Dead - Duplicate',
'Update Opportunity Stage to: 00 Dead - Lost',
'Update Lead Status to: Archive',
'Reject Quote'

variables.name: dropout_threshold_time
variables.description: Time threshold for considering a case as idle, for example '21days'
